message.body: Tonight is good, but there is a glitch.##### has taken ill! He seems to have a bad cold/flu. We will see how he feels a little later. But if he isn't well, I will come alone. Just hanging out at your mom's house sounds just fine!!
Aw, I hope he feels better! Keep me posted, and you're welcome over here any time!!
Okay! What time would be good? Any time 5:30 or after works for me.
Whenever you're ready! We'll be here.
Excellent. Have a great day at work!!
Ryan has gotten worse so I will be coming alone. We will eat at your mom's? Or should I eat before?
We'll eat here! Please tell Ryan that we hope he feels better!
Oh and feel free to wear pajamas!
